Article Tools: This collection of Direct Read News tabs will appear when you've opened a specific message posted within a newsgroup. A description of these tabs appears below:

  • Post Reply: Once you have selected a post from the main newsgroup page, Direct Read News will display that specific message for you. If you click on the "Post" tab at this point, it will let you post a reply to that specific message.

  • Header: If you wished to see the entire header for a particular newsgroup message, this tab will display all of that information for you, including the NNTP Posting Host, Message ID, Reference IDs, and more.

  • Help: Not sure what a certain Direct Read News tab does? Unsure how to post to the newsgroup? Wondering how to subscribe to your favorite newsgroups? The "Help" tab provides you with instant access to these Direct Read News help pages.

  • Previous & Next: These icons allow you to move back and forth between posted messages in a newsgroup without having to go back to the main article page. As an example, if there was a posted message within a newsgroup that had 20 reply messages associated with it, you could click into any one of those messages and use the Previous and Next icons to move back and forth through the various messages associated with that particular discussion thread.
